en-US.name: Home Assistant Bus Tracker
en-US.summary: Ask Alexa where your school bus is using Home Assistant and TrackMate GPS.
en-US.description: Track your school buses in real time using your Home Assistant TrackMate integration. Ask Alexa for the current location and distance from home for any bus.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask home assistant where is bus 2
Alexa, ask home assistant how far is bus 6
Alexa, ask home assistant where's bus 2

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Set HA_URL, HA_TOKEN, and TRACKMATE_DOMAIN environment variables in Lambda.
